forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, possibly heavy at times in the morning. High near 15C. SSW winds at 55 to 80 km/h, decreasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times in the morning. Winds diminishing late. High 59F. SSW winds at 35 to 50 mph, decreasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds light and variable.
